content: yes we 100% legit, please look at my website. i was donated mr reeve's first wheelchair. varfiy with the reeve foundation. i have try for years to help people get mobility. i;ve been in a chair for 13 years and know much it means to me to be outdoors. honestly just letting everyone know there is a cheaper way to go off roading. i run my org to help, dave
